Para Shooting 21-25 March, 2025 Dr. Karni Singh Shooting Range KIPG 2025 Photo Gallery All Para Archery Para Athletics Para Badminton Para PowerLifting Para Shooting More KIPG 2025 Latest News Khelo India Admin March 27, 2025 10:26 AM The matches are set, and the action is about to begin! 🏓🔥 Check out the Para Table Tennis schedule and get ready for an exciting showdown!✨ Khelo India Admin March 27, 2025 10:25 AM The rallies were intense, the competition was fierce, and our para athletes delivered outstanding performances! 🏓 #ParaSports #Praise4Para #ParaGames #KIPG #KIPG2025 Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 09:43 PM Strength, perseverance, and unbreakable spirit! 💪🔥 The results are in, and our para powerlifters have delivered exceptional performances despite every challenge🙌 Celebrating every athlete who defied limits and lifted beyond expectations! 🏆👏 #ParaSports #Praise4Para Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 09:42 PM True strength comes from within, and our para powerlifters prove that nothing can stand in their way! 💪🔥 Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 09:24 PM Swipe through to witness raw power, resilience, and unstoppable determination🙌 Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 04:44 PM Unstoppable spirits, fierce rallies, and pure determination! 🏓🔥 Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 04:40 PM Every point played is a story of courage and perseverance! 💪 Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 04:36 PM Introducing Para Emojis – a step towards inclusivity and equality for our Para Athletes. Launched today at the JLN stadium under the flagship of Khelo India Para Games 2025. Swipe ahead to check out the Fun Emojis. Visit the link below to download the emojis 👇🏻 https://para.kheloindia.gov.in/media-content #ExpressionsOfChange #Inclusivity #Accesibility #Equality Khelo India Admin March 26, 2025 12:45 PM The matchups are locked in! 🏓🔥 Get ready for intense rallies and fierce battles.
